pkgmetadata.longdescription: Modified Mann Kendall Trend Tests // Power of non-parametric Mann-Kendall test is highly influenced by serially correlated data. To address this issue, original time-series may be modified by the following approaches namely Prewhitening (PW), Trend Free Prewhitening (TFPW) and Modified Mann-Kendall tests through variance correction approach by calculating effective sample size. Yue, S., Wang, C. Y. (2002) doi:10.1029/2001WR000861. Yue, S., Pilon, P., Phinney, B., Cavadias, G. (2002) doi:10.1002/hyp.1095. Hamed, K. H., Ramachandra Rao, A. (1998) doi:10.1016/S0022-1694(97)00125-X. Yue, S., Wang, C. Y. (2004) doi:10.1023/B:WARM.0000043140.61082.60. nz, B., Bayazit, M. (2012) doi:10.1002/hyp.8438.
